DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect lifestyle intervention woman pregnancy wish high risk perinatal morbidity overweight obesity . Half patient receive lifestyle intervention half receive usual care . It hypothesize effective lifestyle intervention direct towards healthy living , include reduction overweight obesity , applicable , smoke reduction , health problem mother offspring prevent .
